translations.translation: and the moon when it follows it,
And the moon as she follows in his wake,
and by the moon as it follows it;
by the moon when it follows the sun,
And by oath of the moon when it follows the sun
By the moon as it Talaha.
And the moon when it follows the sun,
and by the moon when she follows him,
And the moon when she followeth him,
and by the moon as it follows it,
By the moon, when she followeth him,
by the moon when he follows her,
By the Moon as she follows him;
And by the moon as it follows it (the sun);
by the moon, which follows it,
And the moon as it follows it.
And [by] the moon when it follows it
[91:2] and [by] the moon when it follows her, rising after she has set,
(And the moon when she followeth him) when it follows the sun, on the first night when the new moon is seen, 757

commentaries.author: ابن عربي
commentaries.text: { والقمر } أي: قمر القلب إذا تلى الروح في التنوّر بها وإقباله نحوها واستضاءته بنورها ولم يتبع النفس فينخسف بظلمتها

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } حق { ٱلْقَمَرِ } أي: الوجود الإضافي الكلي، المحيط على مطلق العكوس والأضلال المنعكسة من مرأة العدم، التي هي عبارة عن سراب العالم غيباً { إِذَا تَلاَهَا } [الشمس: 2] تبعها ولحقها؛ أي: شمس الذات في الإحطة والشمول
